html:
{% macro render_invoice(invoice_type) %}
DELIVERY NOTE

{{ letter_head }}
Buyer Details
{{ doc.address_display }}
GSTIN/UIN : {{ doc.billing_address_gstin or doc.customer_gstin or '' }}
PAN/IT No : {{ doc.pan_it_no or '' }}
State Name: {{ doc.place_of_supply }}
Delivery Note No.
{{doc.name}}
Dated
{{doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
Mode/Terms of Payment
{{ doc.mode_terms_of_payment or ''}}
Supplier's Ref.
{{doc.supplier_ref or ''}}
Other Reference(S)
{{ doc.other_references or '' }}
Buyer's Order No.
{{doc.buyers_order_no or ''}}
Dated
{{ doc.get_formatted("buyers_order_date") or ''}}
Despatched Document No.
{{ doc.despatch_document_no or ''}}
Despatched Through
{{doc.despatched_through or ''}}
Destination :
Terms of Delivery
{{doc.terms_of_delivery or ''}}
E-Way Bill No.
{{doc.e_way_bill or '' }}
{% set totalqty = { 'total':0 } %} {% set totalrate = { 'total1':0 } %} {%- for row in doc.items -%} {% set this_item=frappe.get_doc("Item", row.item_code)%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Code Item Description HSN/SAC GST Rate Quantity
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.description }} {{row.gst_hsn_code}} {% for itax in this_item.taxes %} {% for dtax in doc.taxes %} {% if dtax.account_head == itax.tax_type %} {% set total1 = totalrate.total1 + itax.tax_rate %} {%- if totalrate.update({'total1':total1 }) %} {%- endif %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %} {{ totalrate.total1 }} {%- if totalrate.update({'total1':0 }) %} {%- endif %} {{row.qty}}
Tax Amount Chargable (in words): {{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.total_taxes_and_charges) }}

{{ doc.terms }}

This is Computer Genrated Invoice
{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("challan_cum_tax_invoice") }}
name: Delivery Note Without Price

Sr Description of Goods HSN/SAC GST Rate Quantity Rate Per Amount
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.description }} {{row.gst_hsn_code}} {% for itax in this_item.taxes %} {% for dtax in doc.taxes %} {% if dtax.account_head == itax.tax_type %} {% set total1 = totalrate.total1 + itax.tax_rate %} {%- if totalrate.update({'total1':total1 }) %} {%- endif %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %} {{ totalrate.total1 }} {%- if totalrate.update({'total1':0 }) %} {%- endif %} {{row.qty}} {{row.rate}} {{row.stock_uom}} {{row.amount}}
